body_html:
The above calculation is only an example, the body I use takes quiet some time.
But for the above body - how would you write it down to achieve parallel execution with while_loop?

And building the graph for calRow takes a lot of time if you use bigger numbers.
Is there no easy way to achieve loop parallization?

body:
The above calculation is only an example, the body I use takes quiet some time.
But for the above body - how would you write it down to achieve parallel execution with while_loop?

And building the graph for calRow takes a lot of time if you use bigger numbers. 
Is there no easy way to achieve loop parallization?
